name: VE Tweets
author: virtualemployee

sections.description:
This plugin use for display to latest tweets on your website from your twitter account.

Shortcode

[vetweets limit=”5″]
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The plugin will be available under Settings >> VE Tweets -> on WordPress dashboard page.
sections.changelog:

  • Optmizided code as per latest version of WP

1.0

First release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The plugin will be available under Settings >> VE Tweets -> on WordPress dashboard page.
